appifyr: Create Web Applications from R Functions

Source: R/appifyr.R
appifyr-package.Rd

The appifyr package enables R users to create interactive web applications using OpenCPU as a backend. It provides a bridge between R's analytical capabilities and web interfaces by automatically generating HTML forms for function parameters, connecting these inputs to OpenCPU API calls, and displaying the function outputs.

To learn more about appifyr, start with the vignettes: `browseVignettes(package = "appifyr")`

Key Functions

  • appify: Create a web app from an R function

  • inp_text: Create a text input element

  • inp_number: Create a numeric input element

  • inp_dropdown: Create a dropdown/select input element

  • build_app: Build and install the application

See also

Useful links:

  • https://github.com/retowyss/appifyr

  • Report bugs at https://github.com/retowyss/appifyr/issues
